Package org.fxyz3d.shapes.primitives

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BezierMesh
    Spring based on this model: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trefoil_knot Wrapped around a torus: http://mathoverflow.net/a/91459 Using Frenet-Serret trihedron: http://mathematica.stackexchange.com/a/18612

    ConeMesh  
    CSGMesh  
    CubeMesh  
    CuboidMesh

    Spring based on this model: http://math.stackexchange.com/a/461637 Wrapped around a torus: http://math.stackexchange.com/a/324553 Using Frenet-Serret trihedron: http://mathematica.stackexchange.com/a/18612
    FrustumMesh  
    IcosahedronMesh  
    KnotMesh
    Spring based on this model: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trefoil_knot Wrapped around a torus: http://mathoverflow.net/a/91459 Using Frenet-Serret trihedron: http://mathematica.stackexchange.com/a/18612
    OctahedronMesh  
    PrismMesh  
    PyramidMesh  
    ScatterMesh  
    SegmentedSphereMesh
    SegmentedTorusMesh is based in TorusMesh, but allows cutting the torus in two directions, in order to have a banner parallel to an uncut torus.
    SegmentedTorusMesh
    SegmentedTorusMesh is based in TorusMesh, but allows cutting the torus in two directions, in order to have a banner parallel to an uncut torus.
    SpheroidMesh  
    SpringMesh
    Spring based on this model: http://math.stackexchange.com/a/461637
    SurfacePlotMesh
    SurfacePlotMesh to plot 2D functions z = f(x,y)
    SVG3DMesh  
    TetrahedraMesh  
    TetrahedronMesh  
    Text3DMesh  
    TexturedMesh
    TexturedMesh is a base class that provides support for different mesh implementations taking into account four different kind of textures - None - Image - Colored vertices - Colored faces For the last two ones, number of colors and density map have to be provided Any subclass must use mesh, listVertices and listFaces
    TorusMesh  
    TrapezoidMesh  
    TriangulatedMesh
